glosses: To smell, to give out a scent.
To have a bad smell, to stink, to reek.
For something to show signs of, to feel about to happen.

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish قوقمق (kokmak), from Proto-Turkic *kok-.
Cognate with Karakhanid قُوقْماقْ (qoqmaq, “to give out a smell”), Azerbaijani qoxumaq (“to putrefy, go bad”), Turkmen kokamak (“to stink”).
